titles.title: District of Columbia Loan Repayment Equity Technical Amendment of 2007
To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide eligibility to the District of Columbia for the State Loan Repayment Program.
District of Columbia Loan Repayment Equity Technical Amendment of 2007

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: District of Columbia Loan Repayment Equity Technical Amendment of 2007 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to include the District of Columbia as an eligible jurisdiction under a grant program for states to provide educational loan repayment to health professionals in exchange for the provision of primary health services in health professional shortage areas.
